    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:bioo_es_20070518_2_0030408</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>bioo_es_20070518_2_0030408</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Los Artrópodos</string>
            <string language="en">Arthropods</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gliederfüßer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arthropodes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artrópodes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Artropodi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αρθρόποδα</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Se analizan las características de las generales de los grupos de artrópodos principales. Contiene imágenes de Arácnidos, Crustáceos, Miriápodos e Insectos, así como las características principales de estos grupos.</string>
            <string language="en">Topic analysing the general characteristics of the main arthropod groups. There are images of arachnids, crustaceans, myriapods and insects, as well as the main characteristics of these groups.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biología</string>
            <string language="en">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Artrópodos</string>
            <string language="en">Arthropods</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Thema, welches die allgemeinen Eigenschaften der 
Hauptgliederfüßergruppen analysiert. Es gibt Bilder der 
spinnenartiger Tiere, Krebstiere, myriapods und Insekte, sowie die 
Haupteigenschaften dieser Gruppen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sujet analysant les caractéristiques générales
des groupes principaux d'arthropode. Il y a des images des 
arachnides, crustacés, myriapods et insectes, aussi bien que les 
caractéristiques principales de ces groupes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tópico que analisa as características gerais 
dos grupos principais do artrópode. Há umas imagens dos 
arachnids, crustáceos, myriapods e insetos, as.well.as as 
características principais destes grupos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Soggetto che analizza le caratteristiche generali
dei gruppi principali dell'artropodo. Ci sono immagini delle 
aracnidi, crostacei, myriapods ed insetti, così come le 
caratteristiche principali di questi gruppi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέμα που αναλύει τα γενικά χαρακτηριστικά των βασικών
ομάδων αρθρόποδων. Υπάρχουν εικόνες arachnids, των 
καρκινοειδών, myriapods και των εντόμων, καθώς επίσης και των 
βασικών χαρακτηριστικών αυτών των ομάδων.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gliederfüßer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biosphère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arthropodes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Biologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artrópodes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">biosfera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Biologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Artropodi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βιόσφαιρα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η βιολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αρθρόποδα</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
